titles.title: Expressing the gratitude of the House of Representatives to its Parliamentarian, the Honorable Charles W. Johnson, III.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 651.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/20/2004--Passed House without amendment. Expresses the gratitude of the House of Representatives to the Honorable Charles W. Johnson, III for his unrivaled record of devoted service and steady, impartial guidance as its Parliamentarian.
